title: Custom keybindings in Doom Emacs · Emacs Doomcasts 28

media:group.media:title: Custom keybindings in Doom Emacs · Emacs Doomcasts 28
media:group.media:description:
You can define custom keybindings in Emacs Doom using the `map!` macro. In order to the menu that appears when pressing the spacebar, you must use the `:leader` property. It is also possible to group keybindings into categories thanks to the `:prefix` property.

#emacs #emacsdoom #doomcasts
